website_summaries.verdict: Specifically designed for easy access, this ski bag is well padded in the middle but a little sparse at the ends. Consider wrapping your ski clothes around the tips, especially if you're flying.
pros: Holds a single pair of skis up to 185 centimeters
Bag's center is padded to protect bindings
Long webbing handles can double as shoulder strap.Large, padded carry handle
cons: Little padding at the ends of the bag, making the tips vulnerable

customer_reviews.title: held up fine. In hindsight I wish I ponied up for ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how expensive all these bags are, this one was the cheapest that would fit my skis (180cm). Maybe just enough room for a second set, but I wouldn't fly with 2 pairs in there. I flew Delta with this and padded my skis with my clothes, held up fine. In hindsight I wish I ponied up for a roller bag because it was heavy to lug around public transit. Holding up fine to the abuse I've put it through so far.
customer_reviews.author: William J.

customer_reviews.title: Very visible. Good enough durability.
customer_reviews.text: Unique design and easy to spot at the baggage pickup. Traveled twice; it has a couple of holes now. I now pack my ski ends in oven mitts and and clothes to counter this. I sometimes wish it had wheels, but I can’t fault the seller for that because the product is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W

customer_reviews.title: NOT PADDED!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to protect your ski's during a flight, I do NOT recommend this bag, it has a little bit of padding where the binding will be, but that is it. My husband used it to travel with but ended up using pool noodles to protect the tips and ends of his ski's because the bag is so thin.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Kreger

customer_reviews.title: Very Tight for skis 180-185cm.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag. The only problem is I have a pair of Nordica Enforcer 93 185cm long and they barely fit in the bag which takes a lot of messing around to get them in. Once in no problem they fit with a lot of spare room. Any ski size less then 180 cm should fit in the bag with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: JetSki

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, fits two small sets of skis and poles
customer_reviews.text: This bag makes carrying my skis and poles as well as my 10 year old some ski and ski poles. Both fit in the bag easily. I have not used the bag for air travel, but I have used it in the back of my SUV. The colors are true.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This ski bag is a great value and works as advertised. Holds one pair of skis and poles. Room left in the bag for a few other items. You can also tighten the straps to hold every thing in place. Padding around the binding area. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Big

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag worked great. I let southwest try to damage it but they couldn't. Carried 2 sets of skis and poles without a hitch. Extra straps sinched the skis nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Ski bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag was every thing that was advertised. It was good fit for skis and very durable Very pleased with the item.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Watts

customer_reviews.title: Not 185cm
customer_reviews.text: Not padded at all except for around the bindings. Definitely not 185cm long - you MIGHT fit a pair of 180s.
customer_reviews.author: alexwTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: BUYERS BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ORDER THIS BAG! I just received mine, and I am sending it back. Save your shipping dunnage because you are going to need it. If you were foolish enough to send your skis in this bag on any airline? What you would get on the other end would be splinters...
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: this bag is MUCH wider/taller than expected. I can fit three sets of AT skis in this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product. fits great. could have a little more padding.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Jardim

customer_reviews.title: Did the job, light on padding
customer_reviews.text: Light weight ski bag which did the job because it is pack with ski clothes. The padding is minimal, but with all our ski clothes, it did not matter. Easy to find off the belt
customer_reviews.author: Mark F

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Could use some padding at the ends for tip and tail protection
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Solid Durable Ski Bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice ski bag ... room for skis and some other gear. I’ve had for a short time but appears durable. I would have give a 5 Star but I have to wrestle my 188cm Blizzard Cochise into the bag and I expected the fit to be a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Durable, enough space for all the things. TSA allowed it to go through and didn’t destroy it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee K

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: TOO LIGHT WEIGHT OF A BAG TO PROVIDE ANY PROTECTION FOR YOUR EQUIPMENT.
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA ALEXANDER

customer_reviews.title: A must
customer_reviews.text: THIS BAG IS AWESOME. I love the 3 compartments, two for boots and one for other items. The boot compartments have a drip hole for water and the best part of all is.........IT'S A BACKPACK!!!! Leaving my hands free for other items.
customer_reviews.author: Holly L. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Durable and holds alot of gear.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Second bag that I have owned from High Sierra, i.e. boot bag and ski bag.Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gagnon

product_meta.title: High Sierra Padded Ski Bag for Single Pair of Skis (Up to 185cm) - Black
feature_bullets: Main compartment with U-shaped opening holds a single pair of skis up to 185 cm.
Center of bag is padded to protect bindings.
Quick-release adjustable compression straps on each end.
Long webbing handles can be used as a shoulder strap.
Extra large handle is padded for comfort.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
